snippet.title: Stillness Speaks
snippet.description:
Stillness Speaks (www.StillnessSpeaks.com) is a resource for exploring self-realization/self-discovery through multiple traditions (e.g., Nonduality, Zen-Buddhism, Science-Poetry-Art fusion with Spirituality & more). Stillness Speaks is the web portal for Atma Vicara, a US 501(c) 3 non profit.

The non profit films & distributes content from/about multiple traditions, and teachers, oneness teachings, self-realization & the subject of enlightenment & liberation in general.
 
We enable our visitors to deeply explore the “many paths up the mountain”: from Christian to Sufi, from Zen to Hindu, Kabbalist to Kashmir Shaivism, Advaitic (Nondual) to Indigenous, from philosophical to atheist, from spiritual to scientific. The approach is integral: embracing many traditions, e.g., Advaita/Non-duality, Zen & Buddhism, Gnosticism, Sufism, & the emerging intersection of Science/Art/Poetry with Consciousness.

Cover Image Credit: Summer morning dawn by arskajuhani, https://bit.ly/2IiheJ2, edited.

channel.keywords: Stillness Speaks Spira non-duality advaita enlightenment "Francis Lucille" "Ramana Maharshi" zen buddhism "science and consciousness" poetry consciousness art "indigenous cultures" "american indian" "native american" "kashmir shaivism" sufi rumi buddha "nisargadatta maharaj" "dalai lama" "swami lakshmanjoo" "bob thurman" "joan halifax" "stan grof" "peter russell" papaji "david loy" "henry shukman" "stephen batchelor" "thich nhat hanh" "ryoun yamada" "eckhart tolle" "alan watts" adyashanti gangaji "pamela wilson" "robert adams" "wei wu wei" "jean klein" "paul hedderman" "greg goode"
